name: The Resistance Officer
description:
In a future where the divide between the classes never stopped growing, resulting in an upper class of the super-rich that owned the whole world. Equipping their officers with the best body mods money can buy to keep "peace" throughout the city, or at least that's what they say.  As they got richer the people tried to revolt but to no avail, this Italian officer for the resistance is planning his coup against the government oppressors. 

The project uses scans from 3dscanstore.com for the arm and the head as starting points. 

the uploaded project is composed of 4x1024 materials, 3x512 materials

Blog: https://tadasblog559558516.wordpress.com/

Portfolio: https://www.artstation.com/tadasstudio

Thank you to William Bradley for letting me use his assets for the environment -https://www.artstation.com/william_b_6

Thank you to George Morris and Emanuelle Almandi for lighting aid-

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/XBkXKn 

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/zOnNzd

May Michael Nash rest in peace.
